name: Genji
description: The cyborg ninja Genji Shimada has made peace with the augmented body he once rejected, and in doing so, he has discovered a higher humanity.

abilities.name: Shuriken
abilities.description: Throw an accurate burst of 3 projectiles.  Throw a fan of 3 projectiles in an arc.

abilities.name: Deflect
abilities.description: Deflect incoming projectiles towards the direction you are aiming and block melee attacks.

abilities.name: Swift Strike
abilities.description: Rapidly dash forward and inflict damage on enemies. Eliminations reset the cooldown.

abilities.name: Cyber-Agility
abilities.description: Climb on walls and double jump.

story: Near death at the hands of his own brother, ninja Genji Shimada was rescued by Overwatch. To save his life, they made him a living weapon with cybernetic upgrades. Struggling with his nature and purpose after Overwatch’s fall, Genji sought peace through study with the omnic monk Zenyatta before answering Winston’s call.
